title: User Registration with valid data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register by providing valid information including username, email, and password.

steps.description: Navigate to registration screen
Enter valid username, email, and password
Submit the registration form
Confirm registration success message is displayed and user receives authentication token
Verify user is redirected to login or home screen

title: User Registration with invalid data
description: Verify that the registration process rejects invalid inputs such as missing fields, invalid email format, or weak passwords.

steps.description: Navigate to registration screen
Enter invalid email format and weak password
Submit the registration form
Verify error messages are shown for the invalid inputs
Confirm registration is blocked and no account is created

title: User Login with correct credentials
description: Verify that an existing user can log in successfully using correct username/email and password with token issuance and session storage.

steps.description: Navigate to login screen
Enter valid username/email and password
Click login button
Confirm login success and user is directed to the main dashboard
Validate that authentication token is securely stored and used for subsequent requests

title: User Login with incorrect credentials
description: Verify that login is denied when using incorrect username/email or password, and appropriate error feedback is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to login screen
Enter invalid or incorrect username/email and/or password
Click login button
Check error message is shown indicating failed authentication
Confirm user remains on login screen without token provision

title: Login with biometric authentication
description: Test biometric login flow where users can authenticate using biometric credentials after initial successful login and enrollment.

steps.description: Complete standard login with valid credentials and enroll biometric authentication
Logout from the application
Attempt login using biometric authentication
Confirm successful login without manual credential input

title: Create election with valid data
description: Validate that an admin user can successfully create a new election specifying all required fields including title, candidates, voting rules, and schedule.

steps.description: Login as admin
Navigate to election creation screen
Enter valid election title, add candidates, configure voting rules, set start and end dates
Submit the new election form
Check election is successfully created and listed in election management

title: Create election with invalid or missing data
description: Ensure the election creation form enforces validation by rejecting missing mandatory fields, invalid dates, or no candidates.

steps.description: Login as admin
Navigate to election creation screen
Submit form with missing election title or no candidates
Validate validation error messages are displayed and creation is blocked

title: Search and filter elections
description: Verify that users can search and filter the list of elections by status, date, or keyword to easily find relevant elections to vote in.

steps.description: Open election browsing section
Enter search keywords or apply status/date filters
Check that the election list updates to show only matching elections

title: Voting process with online vote submission
description: Test the entire voting workflow where a user selects candidates, confirms vote, submits the vote, and receives a secure receipt while online.

steps.description: Login as a voter
Navigate to an active election voting screen
Select one or more candidates according to voting rules
Confirm vote and submit
Verify vote is stored on blockchain and a receipt is displayed and saved

title: Voting process with offline vote capability
description: Validate offline voting where users can select candidates, confirm votes, and store votes locally to be synchronized when connectivity is restored.

steps.description: Simulate offline mode on device
Navigate to election voting screen
Select candidates and confirm vote offline
Verify vote is saved locally and user receives receipt
Restore network connectivity
Check vote is synchronized with blockchain backend successfully

title: Display real-time election results with analytics
description: Confirm that election results update in real time with interactive charts, can be verified for integrity, and data can be exported.

steps.description: Navigate to results screen of a live election
Verify charts update automatically as new votes come in
Interact with charts to view analytics and details
Export results data to CSV or other formats
Confirm exported data is complete and accurate

title: Admin user management functions
description: Verify that admin users can add, edit, delete, enable, and disable other user accounts with role assignment and permission enforcement.

steps.description: Login as admin
Navigate to user management screen
Create a new user with specified role
Check new user is listed and can login with assigned role
Edit existing user details and role
Verify updated user information is saved and enforced
Disable user and verify login is rejected for that user
Delete user and confirm removal from user list

title: Blockchain voting transaction verification
description: Test that votes submitted are correctly recorded on the ProjectX blockchain with transaction validation and Proof-of-Authority consensus.

steps.description: Submit valid vote transaction through voting interface
Verify transaction is recorded on blockchain with correct vote details
Confirm transaction passes Proof-of-Authority consensus validation
Check blockchain state synchronizes without conflicts with app database

title: Handle blockchain transaction conflict resolution
description: Verify system behavior when a blockchain transaction conflict occurs and ensure conflict is resolved without data corruption.

steps.description: Simulate conflicting blockchain transaction (e.g., double vote)
Confirm conflict is detected
Verify system resolves conflict according to PoA protocol
Ensure no invalid votes are recorded and correct vote count is maintained

title: Real-time notification of vote count updates
description: Ensure WebSocket real-time communication channels provide instantaneous updates to users and admins when new votes are submitted or election status changes.

steps.description: Open election results screen on multiple clients
Submit new vote from one client
Verify all connected clients receive real-time updates of vote counts and election status

title: Responsive UI behavior on various devices
description: Validate the application UI adapts correctly and remains usable on mobile phones, tablets, desktops, and web browsers with different screen resolutions and orientations.

steps.description: Launch app on Android and iOS devices, desktop environment, and web browsers
Verify UI elements are arranged properly without overlapping or truncation
Check navigation menus, buttons, and inputs remain accessible and usable
Rotate devices to landscape/portrait and verify UI responsiveness
Confirm all content remains visible and properly aligned after orientation change

title: Performance under high user load
description: Conduct tests to confirm the system handles 10,000+ concurrent users submitting votes while maintaining a vote submission response time under 2 seconds.

steps.description: Simulate 10,000+ concurrent users voting simultaneously using load testing tools
Check that 95% or more votes are processed with response times under 2 seconds
Verify no votes are lost or duplicated during the load test

title: Security penetration test for critical vulnerabilities
description: Run security penetration tests targeting authentication, data storage, network communications, blockchain transactions, and admin functions to ensure no critical vulnerabilities exist.

steps.description: Perform penetration testing using standard security tools and manual review
Verify no critical security vulnerabilities or data leaks are detected
Confirm role-based access control cannot be bypassed
Check data in transit is encrypted and blockchain integrity is preserved

title: Cross-platform compatibility test
description: Ensure consistent functionality and user experience on iOS, Android, multiple web browsers, and desktop environments.

steps.description: Install and launch the application on iOS and Android devices
Access the web application from Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers
Use desktop application version on Windows, macOS, and Linux
Verify all core functions like login, voting, results viewing, and admin operations work identically across platforms

title: Navigation flow verification using GoRouter
description: Test navigation flows throughout the application to ensure smooth transitions and correct route handling including deep links and back navigation.

steps.description: Launch app and navigate through login, election browsing, voting, results, and admin dashboard
Confirm URLs and routes update correctly according to GoRouter configuration
Test direct deep link access to specific screens
Verify user is taken to correct screen with proper data loaded
Use back navigation buttons and gestures
Ensure back stack behaves consistently without application crashes
